# inputImage

**Instance Property**

The image to use as an input image.

## Declaration

```swift
var inputImage: CIImage? { get set }
```

## Instance Properties

- **center**: The x and y position to use as the center of the effect.
- **radius**: The radius of the circles in the resulting pattern.
